jediranger:RoughenFeathers.NAME: Roughen Feathers
jediranger:RoughenFeathers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! the top !M! cards of your draw pile.

jediranger:Empower.NAME: Empower
jediranger:Empower.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! all cards in your hand.

jediranger:ArcaneSeer.NAME: Arcane Seer
jediranger:ArcaneSeer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you play a card with no Block or damage this turn, jediranger:Empower !M! the top card of your draw pile.

jediranger:FadingMemories.NAME: Fading Memories
jediranger:FadingMemories.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card played this turn. NL Add an jediranger:Ephemeral copy of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
jediranger:FadingMemories.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card played this turn. NL Add an jediranger:Ephemeral copy of that card into your hand.

jediranger:SignalArrow.NAME: Signal Arrow
jediranger:SignalArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL When Exhausted, draw !M! card.
jediranger:SignalArrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL When Exhausted, draw !M! cards.

jediranger:HeavyArrow.NAME: Heavy Arrow
jediranger:HeavyArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! all cards in your hand.

jediranger:Transfusion.NAME: Transfusion
jediranger:Transfusion.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Empower -1 a card in hand. NL jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! the top card of your draw pile.

jediranger:Illuminate.NAME: Illuminate
jediranger:Illuminate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! a card in hand.

jediranger:RivershaperStrike.NAME: Rivershaper Strike
jediranger:RivershaperStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fetch a card with no Block and damage from your draw pile.

jediranger:Rally.NAME: Rally
jediranger:Rally.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the top card of your draw pile is a Skill, jediranger:Empower !jediranger:EMP! all cards in your hand.

jediranger:PerfectSetup.NAME: Perfect Setup
jediranger:PerfectSetup.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

jediranger:ArrowStab.NAME: Arrow Stab
jediranger:ArrowStab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card.

jediranger:VileFeast.NAME: Vile Feast
jediranger:VileFeast.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Drain !D!. NL Create a *Withering *Strike in hand with damage equal to twice the HP drained. NL Exhaust.

jediranger:Vengeance.NAME: Vengeance
jediranger:Vengeance.DESCRIPTION: jediranger:Drain !D!. NL At the end of your next turn, take damage equal to HP drained. NL Exhaust.
